profile.name: Nicolas Cleik
profile.description: Transitioning from clean code to scalable architecture. I build robust backend systems and intuitive full-stack solutions.

bio: My career is built on the belief that software quality is non-negotiable. I advocate for a 'Quality-First' approach, where postponing a release by two days to ensure Test-Driven Development (TDD) and solid architectural patterns is more valuable than delivering fragile code fast.

With a background bridging Academic Research and Technical Leadership, I specialize in translating complex business requirements (like Churn reduction) into scalable technical solutions. My focus has shifted from merely 'writing code' to designing resilient systems capable of evolving without accumulating technical debt.

projects.title: SaaS Retention Engine
projects.desc: A strategic cancellation flow engineered to reduce Churn. Features a 'Soft Landing' architecture (72h scheduled termination) to enable 'Win-Back' strategies. Integrated with Firebase Firestore to capture qualitative feedback for data-driven decision making.

projects.title: Interactive Health Dashboard
projects.desc: A comprehensive wellness interface featuring a real-time 3D Asset Rendering (using Three.js) combined with biometric data visualization. Built with a modular ES6 architecture to manage state across multiple views.

projects.title: Core Gym Architecture
projects.desc: A high-performance management kernel designed with Clean Architecture principles. Deliberately built without frameworks to enforce strict MVC patterns and raw SQL optimization.

projects.title: IoT Hardware Interface
projects.desc: Embedded system prototype for home automation. Focused on the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) using C++ to manage sensor interrupts and actuator states with real-time constraints.

projects.title: JS Logic Calculator
projects.desc: A logic-layer implementation over a static UI. The core engineering challenge was the Input Mapping System, which creates a seamless hybrid experience by synchronizing Keyboard Events ('keydown') with the GUI.

projects.title: The Simon Game
projects.desc: Classic memory game re-engineered with pure Vanilla JavaScript. Features a custom asynchronous game loop for sequence generation and strict pattern matching algorithms for user validation.

experience.desc: Strategic partnership between Porto Digital & UNIT. Led Squad 28 in developing retention solutions.
achievements: Leadership: Managed agile rituals and implemented 'Job Rotation', improving cross-functional knowledge.
Churn Reduction: Architected specific features to reduce cancellation rates, designing 'Soft Landing' windows.
Legacy Refactoring: Refactored Vanilla JS legacy codebase, eliminating duplication (DRY) and implementing dynamic loading.
Accessibility (a11y): Integrated Native Text-to-Speech (Web Speech API) and VLibras.

publications.title: Campus Party: Smart Tourism Startup
publications.desc: Represented the KARUKA team at Campus Party Weekend. Showcased a Smart Tourism solution featuring AI-driven personalized itineraries.
publications.longDesc: Our team developed KARUKA during the intense hackathon environment. The core value proposition was using AI to generate itineraries based on user personality types, not just popular spots.

publications.title: QoS & Network Slicing Deep Dive
publications.desc: A technical breakdown of traffic prioritization mechanisms in 5G networks.
publications.longDesc: This research explores the transition from simple connectivity to Quality of Experience (QoE). By analyzing Packet Loss, Jitter, and Latency, we demonstrated how Network Slicing allows ISPs to create dedicated virtual networks for critical applications.

publications.title: Angular Ecosystem Guide
publications.desc: Authored a comprehensive 85-page engineering manual covering modern Angular architecture.
publications.longDesc: This guide was born from a need to bridge the gap between Angular theory and real-world application. It covers everything from Dependency Injection and RxJS Observables to component lifecycle hooks.

publications.title: "Demystifying Angular" Workshop
publications.desc: Invited by the Computer Science faculty to design and deliver an intensive hands-on workshop.
publications.longDesc: Led live coding sessions translating complex concepts like State Management into simple, buildable blocks for students.
